metadata.title: CVE-2021-37577 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Bluetooth LE and BR/EDR Secure Connections pairing and Secure SimplePairing using the Passkey entry protocol in Bluetooth Core Specifications2.1 through 5.3 may permit an unauthenticated man-in-the-middle attacker toidentify the Passkey used during pairing by reflection of a crafted publickey with the same X coordinate as the offered public key and by reflectionof the authentication evidence of the initiating device, potentiallypermitting this attacker to complete authenticated pairing with theresponding device using the correct Passkey for the pairing session. Thisis a related issue to CVE-2020-26558.

criterions.comment: bluez package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-10-03').
